text: Shouldn't [`verify_request_token_request`](https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/master/oauthlib/oauth1/rfc5849/__init__.py#L670) call `verify_request` with `require_callback=True` as per RFC section 2.1?
title: OAuth1 server never requires callback

text: It certainly should. Fancy sending a PR? The doc string for validate_redirect_uri should also mentioned the use of the special "oob" value.
Yeah, I can do it tomorrow
